title: 'It's a stonewall foul' - Why Arsenal were lucky to avoid red
body_text:
'It's a stonewall foul' - Why Arsenal were lucky to avoid red

There was an error
Kerys Harrop and Nia Jones explain why Arsenal's Mariona Caldentey was lucky not see a red card for a foul on Manchester City's Lauren Hemp.
